game.name: TS Marketplace: CSX Hanover Subdivision Scenario Pack 01
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The history-rich and scenic countryside of Maryland and Pennsylvania await you in Train Simulator’s CSX Hanover Subdivision route – and now CSX Hanover Subdivision Scenario Pack 01 delivers more railroading experiences on this remarkable route!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The history-rich and scenic countryside of Maryland and Pennsylvania await you in Train Simulator’s CSX Hanover Subdivision route – and now CSX Hanover Subdivision Scenario Pack 01 delivers more railroading experiences on this remarkable route!
